alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Louisa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 11:00AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois...Missouri... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19, Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Bellevue LD12, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Keithsburg. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Water affects most houses on 1st Street in Oquawka. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.5 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 14.7 feet next Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued this evening.
